channel.title: 2nd - Practice & Progress on English Study
channel.description: Recent content in 2nd - Practice & Progress on English Study

item.title: 01. A private conversation
item.description: 要求 内化单词 + 语法 + 习惯用法。 听力 + 口语 + 写作练习 Bilibili 1. 课文 Last week, I went to the theater. I had a very good seat. The play was interesting. But I did not enjoy it. A young man and a young woman were sitting behind me. They were talking loudly. I got very angry. I could not hear the actors.

item.title: 12. Goodbye and good luck
item.description: 要求 内化单词 + 语法 + 习惯用法。 听力 + 口语 + 写作练习 Bilibili 1. 课文 Our neighbour, Captain Charles Alison, will sail from Portsmouth tomorrow. We’ll meet him at the harbour early in the morning. He will be in his small boat, Topsail. Topsail is a famous boat. It has sailed across the Atlantic many times. Capiton Alison will set out at eight o’clock, so we have plenty of time.
